feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: [more inside!]
entry.content:
Post 195486 deleted:

entry.title: A 25-year-old got in a taxi outside an N.Y.C. gay bar.

link.title: A 25-year-old got in a taxi outside an N.Y.C. gay bar.

entry.content:
Post 195458 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, sorry, this is a sad story, but it's not necessarily a great post for Mefi; we want to avoid being a "bad news aggregator" site and try more for articles that give more insight, understanding, information, or in some way bring something more than the news channels. Contact us if you'd like to discuss! -- taz
entry.summary: Post 195458 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, sorry, this is a sad story, but it's not necessarily a great post for Mefi; we want to avoid being a "bad news aggregator" site and try more for articles that give more insight, understanding, information, or in some way bring something more than the news channels. Contact us if you'd like to discuss! -- taz
